description: Joanna Burgess proved she is every bit the doting mum, taking to Instagram on Wednesday to share another Â cute-as-a-button photo of the new family.
title: Joanna Burgess cuddles up to cherubic baby Boston
title_page: Joanna Burgess cuddles up to cherubic baby Boston | Daily Mail Online
text:
She and NRL star husband George Burgess have been showing off baby Boston since they welcomed him into the world, earlier this month.
And Joanna Burgess proved she is every bit the doting mum, taking to Instagram on Wednesday to share another cute-as-a-button photo of the new family.
The photo shows George and Joanna, both looking casual, happy and relaxed, while the cherubic Boston sleeps soundly on mum's chest.
Big love: Joanna Burgess proved she is every bit the doting mum, taking to Instagram on Wednesday to share another cute-as-a-button photo of the new family
Both George and Joanna are soaking up the sun, wearing reflective sunglasses while George enjoys what looks to be a milkshake and Joanna an ice water.
Boston, meanwhile, looks like he doesn't have a care in the world as he rests on Joanna's chest, wearing a white onesie with blue stripes
'Meal time with my babes,' Joanna captioned the photo with the hashtag Boston and two kiss emojis.
Cute as a button: Boston, meanwhile, looks like he doesn't have a care in the world as he rests on Joanna's chest, wearing a white onesie with blue stripes
Fans of the new family were quick to gush over the gorgeous photo with one follower offering: 'couple goals, parenting goals, life goals', while others commented with the likes of 'cuties' and 'beautiful'.
Since welcoming Boston into the world, earlier this month, both George and Joanna have been, quite rightly gushing over their perfect progeny on social media.
Joanna recently shared a gorgeous mother-and-son photo taking in the sea breeze while Boston naps in her arms, swaddled in blankets, and dad gets some laps in.
Strong bond:Since welcoming Boston into the world, earlier this month, both George and Joanna have been, quite rightly gushing over their perfect progeny on social media.
Joanna captioned her post: 'Shade and fresh air while Daddy goes for his morning swim #GameDay,' and tagged her husband.
George has also been prolific with the social media baby-boasting.
Last week he posted a couple of gorgeous black and white photos showing him doting on his new son.
One photo shows George's hand cradling Bostons, while another which he captioned:' We are Devoted Daddies... nothing better than coming home to your little ones after a long days training.'
Doting: Strong bond: George has also been prolific with the baby-boasting. Last week he posted a couple of gorgeous black and white photos showing him doting on his new son
